dimred: Dimensionality Reduction of Markov Chains¶

The dimred sub-package of graph_tran contains functions to analysize a continuous-time Markov chain parameterized by a rate matrix \(\textbf{K}\), as well as estimate a reduced Markov chain from a given community structure. The package has the capability to interface with the graph transformation tools available in graph_tran/gt_tools as well as the external PATHSAMPLE program, which also has an implementation of the GT algorithm in the Fortran language.

Contents:

  • dimred.partialGT
    • Partial graph transformation: A dimensionality reduction strategy
  • dimred.ktn_analysis
    • Optimal Markovian coarse-graining given a community structure
  • dimred.pathsample_wrapper
    • Wrapper to PATHSAMPLE implementation of graph transformation
